ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder
Class SearchByPantryActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.SearchByPantryActivity

public class SearchByPantryActivity
extends Activity

Author:
adam This activity is launched when the user selects "Search Using My Pantry" from the Search tab. The user selects ingredients from their pantry, which are returned to the main activity as an ArrayList and used in an ingredients search.

protected  void emptySearchDialog()
          This method creates a dialog which informs the user that at least one ingredient must be selected to search by.

Method Detail

onCreate

protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

setListViewOnClickListener

protected void setListViewOnClickListener()
This method sets up an on click listener for the list view. The index of the ingredient is either added or removed from indicesToBeSearched depending if the check box is already clicked.

emptySearchDialog

protected void emptySearchDialog()
This method creates a dialog which informs the user that at least one ingredient must be selected to search by.
